comment: Big grapefruit taste out of the bottling bucket. Odd mix. Hopefully it will mellow and the maltiness will balance it out.

Finished at 1.018, but took reading after priming sugar.
Brewed hot at 80 degrees.
Lots of grapefruit at bottling. Bad.
Grapefruit subsided after 1-1/2 in bottle. Good carb. Very cloudy. Way too cloudy.
